mapper.select: select d.id, d.name, d.major, d.state,nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where d.state = 'dcode003'

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where cut_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where cut_yn ='Y' and state = 'dcode003'

select d.id, d.name, d.major, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')fileUuid, nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)fileState from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d where makeup_yn = 'Y' ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id left join ( select file_state, file_uuid, des_id from files where file_state='pro' )f on d.id = f.des_id where makeup_yn ='Y' and state = 'dcode003'

select d.id, d.name, d.major,d.career, d.major_gender, nvl2(r.rate,r.rate,0)as rate from DESIGNER d left join ( select des_id , TRUNC(AVG(RATE),1) AS RATE from review where des_id in ( select id from DESIGNER d ) group by des_id) r on d.id = r.des_id where d.id= #{id}
select r.title, r.rate,r.des_id, m.name as mName from review r join member m on m.id = r.mem_id where des_id= #{id}
select d.id,nvl2(f.file_state,f.file_state,0)as file_state, nvl2(f.file_uuid,f.file_uuid,'0.png')as file_uuid from designer d left join files f on d.id = f.des_id where d.id = #{id}

select dc.* , d.name , nvl2(file_uuid , file_uuid , 'logo.jpg')as file_uuid from des_course dc left join ( select file_uuid , cour_no , file_state from files where file_state = 'thum' ) f on dc.cour_no = f.cour_no join DESIGNER d on dc.id = d.id where dc.id = #{id}
